attributes.action: Stop the Family Farm Tax ( APR ) to save British Farming
attributes.additional_details: The Governments scheme to take away APR and BPR needs to be stopped as it will effect almost every farm in the UK and will target British farming that is already at a all time low due to high costs and low food prices. If this scheme is not stopped and carries on it will lead to the destruction of British Farming and British Family Business, this is unfair to the future generation of farming especially when Farming is the Backbone of United Kingdom.
attributes.background: The Government need to re-look at there new Inheritance tax rule and there figures to back the scheme up as they are wrong and will lead to the destruction of British Farming

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
